column4: i'm on via wireless on my laptop which just finished installing ubuntu about 10 minutes ago :-)
Oh but i do have a problem!! Synaptics Touchpad isn't working on my laptop, and i've been digging around, if anyone has resolved this in the past i'd love a chance to chat about it
or are you looking for smart monitoring software?
not sure what i'm looking for, but i'm nervous about having hard disks die
